summary: Comprehensive testing of medical appointment booking system completed successfully. Backend APIs working at 95.8% success rate, frontend fully functional with complete patient-doctor workflow integration.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 403 instead of expected 401 for unauthorized access
minor_issues.impact: Very minor - authentication still works correctly

ui_bugs.issue: Dropdown selection has pointer event interception issues
ui_bugs.workaround: Filter still works, just requires different interaction approach

passed_tests: Doctor profile creation with specialties and fees
Doctor schedule management (create schedules with time slots)
Doctor appointment management (confirm, complete with notes)
Real-time data synchronization between patient and doctor views
All CRUD operations for appointments, schedules, and profiles
